Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.string

Class CaseFormat

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.string.CaseFormat
public class CaseFormat extends Object
Converts between different styles of casing:
  • camelCase
  • Capitalized
  • lower-hyphenated
  • UPPER_UNDERSCORE
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
